sentences.en: A crew of assistants oiled and adjusted the release mechanism until it worked perfectly.
sentences.cn: 一班助手给排放装置加润滑油并作调试，直到其达至理想工作状态。

sentences.en: A ratchet mechanism transfers the thread from spool to bobbin.
sentences.cn: 一种棘齿装置把线从线轴转到梭心上。

sentences.en: He described Britain's entry into the European Exchange Rate Mechanism as an historic move.
sentences.cn: 他将英国加入欧洲汇率机制描述为具有历史意义的一步。

sentences.en: I assembled the weapon, checked the firing and recoil mechanism and loaded it.
sentences.cn: 我把家伙组装起来，检查了一下击发和反冲机构，装上子弹。

sentences.en: In April 1992 the Greek drachma was the only Community currency not yet part of the EMS exchange-rate mechanism.
sentences.cn: 1992年4月间希腊的德拉克马是唯一一种还未纳入欧洲货币体系兑换机制的欧共体成员国货币。

sentences.en: Meteorologist believe this pressure jump is the mechanism responsible for storm and tornado.
sentences.cn: 气象学家认为这一气压的突然升高是暴风雨和飓风形成的物理机制.

sentences.en: Normally, when demand and supply are out of sync, you either increase the supply, or you adjust the price mechanism.
sentences.cn: 通常，当供需失衡时，要么加大供给，要么调整价格机制。

sentences.en: She disengaged the film advance mechanism on the camera.
sentences.cn: 她松开了照相机上的送片装置。

sentences.en: Some objects had got entangled with the underneath mechanism of the engine.
sentences.cn: 一些东西缠在了发动机下面的机件上。

sentences.en: The amplitude at the driven end is fixed by the driving mechanism.
sentences.cn: 由于驱动机构的作用,使驱动端的振幅保持不变.

sentences.en: The Army has set up mechanisms to help jobless ex-soldiers get work.
sentences.cn: 军队建立了帮助无工作的退伍军人找到工作的机制。

sentences.en: The bones and muscles are parts of the mechanism of the body.
sentences.cn: 骨骼和肌肉是人体的组成部件.

sentences.en: The mechanism of the machine is very complicated.
sentences.cn: 这台机器的结构是非常复杂的.

sentences.en: Vibration displaced part of the mechanism.
sentences.cn: 部分机械装置因受震动而移位了.
